item.title: About
item.author: renanbastos.tec@gmail.com (Renan Bastos)
item.description: I have a deep passion for technology, innovation, and entrepreneurship, and I am constantly driven to expand my knowledge and skills. With over 7 years of experience as a Software Engineer, I have a strong track record in developing software and web systems to the highest standards. Throughout my career, I have collaborated with diverse stakeholders from both technical and non-technical backgrounds, ensuring clear communication, maintaining a focus on quality, and facilitating continuous delivery.

item.title: Posts
item.author: renanbastos.tec@gmail.com (Renan Bastos)
item.description: English Boneless: a CLI to create your apps with Go How to verify if the context has a deadline Do we must implements unit test just to have coverage? Using redirect middleware with GoFiber Portuguese Criando meu pacote de erro usando Go Como verificar se o contexto tem um prazo para finalizar em Golang Como Fazer Restore do MongoDB usando mongorestore com Arquivos wiredTriger Qual a diferen√ßa de usar um receiver com ou sem ponteiro em Go?
